About Me

Hi! Welcome to my website!

My name is Conor Bailey and i'm from Essex, UK. I'm interested in programming. Up to this point I have been learning HTML, CSS (SASS), Javascript which were used to create this website. I have also been learning the Python programming language. This personal website is my first small development project and I will continue to add future projects to my portfolio so keep an eye on this website. In the meantime, I have posted some of my music productions below under 'Projects'. I have a keen interest in electornic music production so feel free to have a listen. Thank you for checking out my website.

Conor
